directions: Chop the chocolate bar into small pieces.
Melt the chopped chocolate in a microwave or using a double boiler, stirring occasionally until smooth.
Pour the melted chocolate onto a sheet of parchment paper or a silicone baking mat, spreading it out into a thin layer.
Allow the chocolate to cool and harden completely.
Once hardened, break the chocolate into small, irregularly shaped pieces to create chocolate chips.
